DOC.brief_title: Multi-Country Observational Study Collect Frequency Sexual Dysfunction With Antidepressant Treatment , Either With SSRIs Duals 8 Weeks 6 Months
DOC.criteria: Meet criterion MDD , define ICD10 DSMIVTR Are least moderately depressed ( baseline CGIS le equal 4 ) Provide write consent release data inform study Present episode MDD ( current , new first episode ) within normal course care , agree initiate antidepressant therapy available SSRI SNRI class antidepressant accordance investigator 's decision management patient Have sexually active week prior enrollment , either partner autoerotic activity Meet follow criterion sexual dysfunction study entry ( McGahuey et . 2000 : ASEX total score less equal 19 ASEX score less equal 5 item , ASEX score less equal 4 3 item Are simultaneously participate different study include treatment intervention and/or investigational drug Have history treatment resistant depression ( TRD ) define failure respond 2 different antidepressant different class treatment therapeutic dose minimum 4 week Have previous current diagnosis schizophrenia , schizophreniform , schizoaffective disorder , bipolar disorder , dysthymia , mental retardation , dementia Have receive antidepressant within 1 week prior enrollment ( 1 month prior enrollment fluoxetine )
